title.native: かつて魔法少女と悪は敵対していた。
title.romaji: Katsute Mahou Shoujo to Aku wa Tekitai Shite Ita.
title.english: The Magical Girl and the Evil Lieutenant Used to Be Archenemies

description:
An evil organization invades and destroys everything in its path. The brains of the brutal operation is the king’s right-hand man, an evil lieutenant named Mira. Everything changes when a magical girl named Byakuya Mimori tries to stop the evil group in their tracks. When Mira confronts her, he knows it’s love at first sight. What will become of Mira and Byakuya, stuck between orders and love?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

title.native: かつて魔法少女と悪は敵対していた。

node.description: __[Blog](https://ameblo.jp/cocoafujiwara/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cocoafujiwara)__ Her debut was with a work called CALLING, which she made when she was only fifteen. She choose not to go to high school so that she could draw manga. Fujiwara was a large fan of RPGs such as Final Fantasy, which showed in her works. She passed away from an illness at the age of 31 on March 31, 2015, leaving her series Katsute Mahou Shoujo wa Aku wo Tekitai Shite Ita unfinished.

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](http://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=68) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mai__nakahara) | [Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mai_Nakahara)

A voice actress and singer.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
• Seele Vollerei - Honkai Impact 3rd, Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
• Kaavi - Mahjong Soul (VG)
• Hiyori Tsuchinaga - Blue Archive (VG) 
• Cantarella - Wuthering Waves (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/onoyuki19840622) | [Official Website](http://www.onoyuki.com/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/onoyuki_official/)

__Height:__ 167cm

Yuuki Ono is a Japanese voice actor and singer who dubs in anime shows and video games. He was represented by Atomic Monkey and is now a freelancer. His major roles are: Josuke Higashikata in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Diamond Is Unbreakable, Taiga Kagami in Kuroko's Basketball, Zenkichi Hitoyoshi in Medaka Box, Kaname Tsukahara in Kimi to Boku, Masayuki Hori in Monthly Girls' Nozaki-kun and Ishisaki Jun in Ace of Diamond. 

On October 2, 2017, Ono announced his marriage from the last seven years prior in his blog post. His wife is a person who works outside the entertainment industry. On August 2020, Ono announced the birth of his first child.

**Non-Anime Roles**
- Jiyan - Wuthering Waves (VG)

__Date of Birth:__ November 12, ????

__Koutarou Odaka__ is a Japanese pianist, guitarist, composer and arranger.

__Date of Birth:__ November 12, ????

__Koutarou Odaka__ is a Japanese pianist, guitarist, composer and arranger.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [background artist](https://anilist.co/staff/235407/)._
